items.markText: The lonesomest thing in all the world is a soul when it is making ready to go on its mysterious, far journey.
let it fall to its full length.

users.name: 莫念
users.vDesc: 青山一道同云雨，明月何时照我还

items.markText: When one loves one’s Art no service seems too hard.

chapters.title: 07 The Romance of a Busy Broker
